def_cn: 选择性的;有选择的;选取少量的
def_en: A selective process applies only to a few things or people.

def_cn: 仔细挑选的;严格筛选的
def_en: When someone is selective, they choose things carefully, for example the things that they buy or do.

def_cn: (记忆)选择性的，只记一部分的
def_en: If you say that someone has a selective memory, you disapprove of the fact that they remember certain facts about something and deliberately forget others, often because it is convenient for them to do so.
